channel.title: Making Animated Login Screen
channel.description: I am makign a server like real RSC and so far its going well (Purple Buttons, Proper Login Screen, ect) and I want to make the login picture an animated gif. I'm pretty sure its possible because I seen it in an earlier versioin of ProjectP2P.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 08, 2009, 08:48:04 pm[/size][hr]It would be splendid if someone were to tell me how to do this.

item.title: Making Animated Login Screen
item.dc:creator: @Shadowsoul Shadowsoul
item.description:
@Shadowsoul wrote:

[quote=“gawdz666, post:13, topic:301095”]…
where the entitys are loaded…

the data folder is where the media/sprites are…
but its JAVA CODE that loads them…

see JAVA is what is used to code RUNESCAPE…

inside this java code theres something that loads the media… draws graphics …

find out where its being loaded from and draw a picture… then delete the picture draw another picture a little more animated…

i.e. the way when you click the mouse in game on rsc it tends to animate from big to small…[/quote]

I think I got this =D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 09, 2009, 08:25:46 pm[/size][hr]I already know how to change the login screen but I can’t get it to go animated and gawdz isin’t making much sesnse…

Read full topic

item.title: Making Animated Login Screen
item.dc:creator: @gawdz666 gawdz666
item.description:
@gawdz666 wrote:

…
where the entitys are loaded…

the data folder is where the media/sprites are…

but its JAVA CODE that loads them…

see JAVA is what is used to code RUNESCAPE…

inside this java code theres something that loads the media… draws graphics …

find out where its being loaded from and draw a picture… then delete the picture draw another picture a little more animated…

i.e. the way when you click the mouse in game on rsc it tends to animate from big to small…

Read full topic

make it draw the images into a animation like sequence upon loading…[/quote]
